info.name: AI Platform Copy
info.description: Multi-tenant AI platform: health, documents, notary summarize, classify, ask.

exec: pm.test('Response time is less than 5000ms', function () {
pm.test('Timestamp is valid ISO format', function () {
pm.test('Response time is less than 5000ms', function () {

request.description: Create a document for the current tenant. Uses unique doc_id per run to avoid duplicate key errors.

response.name: 201 - Document Created
response.body:
{
  "id": "doc-1",
  "title": "Sample contract",
  "text": "This is the full document text.",
  "tenant_id": "tenant-123",
  "created_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z"
}

exec: pm.test('Response time is less than 5000ms', function () {

request.description: Get a document by id. Uses doc_id from Create document (same run). Returns 404 if not found or wrong tenant.

response.name: 200 - Document Found
response.body:
{
  "id": "doc-1",
  "title": "Sample contract",
  "text": "This is the full document text.",
  "tenant_id": "tenant-123",
  "created_at": "2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z"
}

exec: pm.test('Response time is less than 10000ms (AI endpoint)', function () {
pm.test('Source is llm or fallback', function () {

request.description: Summarize notarial-style document from inline text. language: nl | en.

response.name: 200 - Summary (LLM)
200 - Summary (Fallback)
response.body:
{
  "summary": "This notarial deed concerns the transfer of property.",
  "source": "fallback",
  "language": "en",
  "processing_time_ms": 45,
  "fallback_reason": "LLM service unavailable"
}

response.name: 500 - Internal Server Error

exec: pm.test('Response time is less than 10000ms (AI endpoint)', function () {
pm.test('Source is llm or fallback', function () {

request.description: Summarize using stored document text. Create the document first with Documents > Create document.

response.name: 200 - Summary by Document ID (LLM)
response.body:
{
  "summary": "Dit is een samenvatting van het voorbeeldcontract.",
  "source": "llm",
  "language": "nl",

  "processing_time_ms": 1845
}

response.name: 200 - Summary by Document ID (Fallback)
response.body:
{
  "summary": "This is the full document text.",
  "source": "fallback",
  "language": "nl",
  "document_id": "doc-1",
  "processing_time_ms": 32,
  "fallback_reason": "LLM service timeout"
}
